catentdesc.name: Oranges
catentdesc.longdescription: High in vitamin C and bursting with flavor. Great as a snack or fresh squeezed into juice. Part of a complete and balanced breakfast.

catentdesc.name: Blackberries
catentdesc.longdescription: Sweet with just a bit of tartness, blackberries are perfect on their own or with ice cream. Part of a complete and balanced breakfast. Blackberries are also perfect for making jam.

catentdesc.name: Mangoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Mangoes are a delicious tropical delight. Rich in vitamins, antioxidants and minerals. Imported daily fresh from Peru.

catentdesc.name: Pears
catentdesc.longdescription: Pears have a soft buttery yet slightly grainy texture. Related to the quince fruit but easier to eat raw. A delicious alternative to the every day apple.

catentdesc.name: Seedless Grapes
catentdesc.longdescription: Grapes were once considered a luxury treat. Bursting with flavor, grapes are a refreshing snack. Great in a bowl with yogourt and granola.

catentdesc.name: Peaches
catentdesc.longdescription: Sweet and juicy with a pit in the middle. Enjoy the taste of summer in fresh peaches. Part of a complete and balanced breakfast.

catentdesc.name: Concord Grapes
catentdesc.longdescription: Fuller in flavor than green grapes. Seedless grapes are the perfect guilt free snack. Bet you can't eat just one!

catentdesc.name: Strawberries
catentdesc.longdescription: Plump and bursting with flavour. Strawberries are great eaten fresh, on ice cream or dipped in chocolate. Great for making jam to store for the winter months.

catentdesc.name: Red Delicious Apples
catentdesc.longdescription: Red Delicious apples are perfect for eating fresh, in salads, or for juicing. For more fun, try dipping apples in hot caramel. As a game, fill a tub with water and play bobbing for apples.

catentdesc.name: Crispin Apples
catentdesc.shortdescription: Perfect pie or sauce making apples.
catentdesc.longdescription: Cross between the Golden Delicious and the Japanese Indo. Firm, pleasing texture with just the right amount of tartness. Crispin apples keep their shape and texture in baking, making them perfect for pies.

catentdesc.name: Bananas
catentdesc.longdescription: Bananas are high in vitamin B6, vitamin C and potassium. They are the perfect on the go snack and a healthy alternative to a chocolate bar. As an indulgence, make a banasplit with ice cream, whipped cream and chocolate syrup.
